Cyber-Buddy/APKHunt

Static analysis for Android apps based on the OWASP MASVS framework

View on index

Related repos

  • Tool for reverse engineering Android apps
  • scan Android APKs for security issues and generate reports
  • system profiling and tracing for Android and Linux
  • Manipulates Android and iOS apps at runtime via a web interface
  • Android app for wireless and hardware security testing, inspired by Flipper Zero
  • Resources for Android reverse engineering training and tools
  • Android app for capturing and analyzing NFC traffic
  • Track, analyze, and block network connections on Android without root
  • Scans for trackers on Android devices
